meaning: the quality of being worthy of attention; importance
example: The significance of this discovery cannot be overstated.

meaning: damaged or tarnished; made dirty or impure
example: The politician's sullied reputation made it difficult to gain public trust.
The old system was supplanted by more efficient technology.

meaning: the state or fact of being likely or liable to be influenced or harmed by a particular thing
example: His susceptibility to colds made him avoid crowded places during flu season.
